vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Levi living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.6.30;
son of: Shimea (H8092);
father of: Asaiah (H6222I)
§ Haggiah = "festival of Jehovah"
son of Shimea and a Merarite Levite
vocabInfos._es_Definition: hijo de Simá; descendiente de Merarí; tribu de Leví
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
哈基雅 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "耶和華的筵席"
利未人, 示米亞的兒子 (代上 6:30)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
哈基雅 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "耶和华的筵席"
利未人, 示米亚的儿子 (代上 6:30)
